title: (x) scratched lettering on Paramore "Riot" album cover - hand lettered {Sebastian}
content:
hi guys

im just doing an assignment on a band called paramore

and i was wondering...has anyone seen a font similar to their new album cover [preview below]

and direction would help

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20091023125910/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%202_47.png) | 54.86 KB |
| [1185644676-561-1.gif.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091023125910/http:/typophile.com/files/1185644676-561-1.gif.jpg) | 76.16 KB |
author: adrix696

comments.content: This looks 100% hand lettered to me. But a quick search for ’scratched’ fonts should give you some results.

[B-Movie Retro](http://web.archive.org/web/20091023125910/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typonauten/b-movie-retro/) by Typonauten? … not _really_ similar, but then, why do you want to use a font at all? I’d prefer your (?) handwritten letters.
